pair.title: Add DoorBird
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the fields.
pair.unauthorized: Error 401: this user is not authorized, make sure you have created the user in the app and entered the correct details.
pair.timeout: Timeout error: make sure you have entered the correct IP address and that the DoorBird is online.
pair.unknownerror: Unknown error, are you sure you have entered the correct IP address and Homey is on the same network as the DoorBird? Please check your settings and try again.
pair.intro: Create a new user in the DoorBird smartphone app. Then enter the IP address and the details of this user below.
pair.testing: DoorBird connection test succesful, you can now connect the DoorBird.
pair.titleselection: What do you want to do?
pair.nodevices: No devices have been discovered. You can try again or use manual pairing if you know the IP address of your DoorBird device.
pair.intro: Enter the IP address, username and password for your DoorBird device.

settings.title: DoorBird Settings
settings.intro-email: These settings are needed for sending snapshot images through email. If you wish to send emails through Gmail SMTP servers and you are using 2-step authentication you first need to create an app password in your Google Account.
settings.testing: Settings have been tested succesfully. You should have received a test email.

util.test_email_body_text: This is a test email which confirms your email settings in the Homey DoorBird App are correct.

util.open_door: Do you want me to open the door?
util.not_understand: I did not understand you correctly, please try again.
util.relay_triggered: OK, the door relay has been triggered.
util.unauthorized: Error 401: this user is not authorized, make sure you have created the user in the app and entered the correct details.
util.timeout: Timeout error: make sure you have a stable network connection with your DoorBird.
